contentList.content: Weapons will glow with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LIGHT">Light</LSTag> when entering an obscured area. They will dim upon entering sunlight.
Remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LIGHT">Light</LSTag> from currently equipped weapons and remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SIN_LIGHT">Autolight</LSTag> from yourself.
Weapons will glow brightly with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAYLIGHT">Daylight</LSTag> when entering an Obscured area. They will not dim until Long Rest or dispelled.
Remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAYLIGHT">Daylight</LSTag> from currently equipped weapons and remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SIN_DAYLIGHT">Autodaylight</LSTag> from yourself.
Produce a hovering orb of light that follows the target, illuminating a [1] area.
A hovering orb of light will illuminate a [1] area when entering an obscured area. It will dim upon entering sunlight, sneaking or turning invisible.
